edu.wpi.cs.wpisuitetng.modules.defecttracker.defect

Class ComboUpdateListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.wpi.cs.wpisuitetng.modules.defecttracker.defect.ComboUpdateListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ItemListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class ComboUpdateListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ItemListener
    Checks for whether or not the text in a given JComboBox differs from the current model (a Defect). Whenever a key is released in the ItemListener's component, checkIfUpdated() is called. This method gets the component's name and looks up the value of the relevant field in panel's Defect model. It then compares this value to the component's selection to see if the text differs from the model. If the selection differs, the style of the component is changed to show that it differs from the relevant field in the model. Otherwise, the component's style is changed to be normal.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ComboUpdateListener

        public ComboUpdateListener(DefectPanel panel,
                   javax.swing.JComboBox component)
        Constructs a ComboUpdateListener.
        Parameters:
        panel - The DefectPanel which contains the JTextComponent.
        component - The JComboBox which will have its selection compared to the model. The name of the JComboBox must match the name of a getter in Defect after the "get". For instance: for the method "getStatus", the name of the JComboBox must be "Status".
